meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Val Webster Rob Reilly Mark McDermott Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #987.

td.p: Val Webster, an applications specialist from Sparks, Maryland
Rob Reilly, a consultant originally from Delaware
Mark McDermott, an editorial writer originally from Iowa (whose 4-day cash winnings total $35,101)

tr.td: IN THE NEWS
NEW JERSEY
SLANG
CELEBRITY MARRIAGES
ENGINEERING
THE BIG TOP
